entry.title: Shower
entry.summary: Pressurized waters massaging shoulders, release creativity

entry.title: Suntimes
entry.content:
Suntimes I wonder,
How it would feel, being you —
Bringing light to all
entry.summary: Suntimes I wonder, How it would feel, being you — Bringing light to all

entry.title: A Rat
entry.content: A fat rat raised in New York, Was feasting on leftover pork, He explained at his companions behest, Why the pork in Chinatown was best, “All other preparations are a hard chew, All except this delicious Char Siu”
entry.summary: A fat rat raised in New York, Was feasting on leftover pork, He explained at his companions behest, Why the pork in Chinatown was best, “All other preparations are a hard chew, All except this delicious Char Siu”

entry.title: Sum
entry.content:
sum are scared of me, sum are obsessed with me, all my forms, all my complexity, sumtimes intractable, sumtimes elegant, all equal to me.

— math
entry.summary: sum are scared of me, sum are obsessed with me, all my forms, all my complexity, sumtimes intractable, sumtimes elegant, all equal to me.
